today_in_history_posts.title: RFC for BIP: Derivation scheme for P2WPKH-nested-in-P2SH based accounts
today_in_history_posts.summary:
- Daniel Weigl has prepared a Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) related to BIP44-compliant wallets.
- The proposal is available on GitHub for community comments.
- Daniel requested a number for the proposal, pending no objections.

today_in_history_posts.title: [BOLT RFC#1] Encryption spec
today_in_history_posts.summary:
- A developer considers adding an encryption layer to Amiko Pay, raising several questions.
- Concerns include public keys' use per link for privacy and countermeasures against MITM attacks.
- Questions about message authentication, distinguishing messages, and the ack field's role were highlighted.

today_in_history_posts.title: Estimating Likelihood for Lightning Payments to be (in)feasible
today_in_history_posts.summary:
- Rene Pickhardt is developing a paper on understanding Lightning Network payment channels.
- His work proposes new models to better estimate payment success rates on the network.
- Pickhardt's methodology differs by considering realistic wealth distributions and network dynamics.
